title: BLEEDING THROUGH Recruits COMEBACK KID's Frontman For New Single "I Am Resistance"
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 4 hours ago
text: New Music Nine is comin' for you. Bleeding Through is set to destroy your speakers with a new record Nine on February 14 – but before then, they've got "I Am Resistance" featuring Comeback Kid vocalist Andrew Neufeld streaming right now. Which as you might imagine is a bit of a rager. "'I Am Resistance' is a song about self reflection," said Bleeding Through vocalist Brandan Schieppati. "It's the times in your life that you come close to rock bottom and lose yourself. This song is about the battle of self medication and self destructive behaviors that sometimes grip your throat in life. This is a pledge to what you love and what you are truly devoted to." On Nine, Schieppati added: "There's so much passion and aggression on this album. If you're a fan of us, you won't be let down. This is everything we've been working towards. This is the culmination of 25 years. This is Bleeding Through in its purest form." Pre-orders for Nine are available here. Want More Metal? html:
New Music

Nine is comin' for you.

Bleeding Through is set to destroy your speakers with a new record Nine on February 14 – but before then, they've got "I Am Resistance" featuring Comeback Kid vocalist Andrew Neufeld streaming right now. Which as you might imagine is a bit of a rager.

"'I Am Resistance' is a song about self reflection," said Bleeding Through vocalist Brandan Schieppati. "It's the times in your life that you come close to rock bottom and lose yourself. This song is about the battle of self medication and self destructive behaviors that sometimes grip your throat in life. This is a pledge to what you love and what you are truly devoted to."

On Nine, Schieppati added: "There's so much passion and aggression on this album. If you're a fan of us, you won't be let down. This is everything we've been working towards. This is the culmination of 25 years. This is Bleeding Through in its purest form."

Pre-orders for Nine are available here.
